General.Name: Shenzhen Tellus Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Tellus Holding Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in automobiles sales, and maintenance and testing activities in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Automobile Sales, Vehicle Maintenance and Test, Leasing and Services, and Jewelry Sales and Services segments. It also engages in the leasing and management of properties; sale of accessories; production and sale of spare parts; purchase, sale, and leasing of gold ornaments and precious metal products; leasing of safe deposit boxes and warehousing services; and provision of jewelry fair planning, jewelry consignment, exhibition planning, conference, and marketing planning services. In addition, the company is involved in investment in bar sales, gold recycling, and gold purification/exchange services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Tellus Machinery Holding Company Limited and changed its name to Shenzhen Tellus Holding Co., Ltd. in March 1993. Shenzhen Tellus Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
